headline: 2 Beaten-Down Tech Stocks to Watch in June
summary: The recent market turmoil has provided investors with an opportunity to seek out deals in the market.  Even though the S&P 500 has recovered most of its losses in 2025, this has been a challenging year for some stocks as they grapple with regulatory challenges and economic uncertainty.  Let's explore the pros and cons for Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) and Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL)(NASDAQ: GOOG).

headline: Nvidia (Finally) Missed; Time To Buy With Ease (Rating Upgrade)
